column2: A sweet cocktail made with rum, coconut cream or coconut milk, and pineapple juice
Made with whiskey, sweet vermouth, and bitters.
Cocktail of vodka and coffee liqueur, also known as a "Black Ewan".
Cocktail made with vodka, triple sec, cranberry juice, and freshly squeezed or sweetened lime juice.
An IBA official cocktail made of vermouth, cherry eau de vie and fruit syrup.
A traditional Cuban highball. Traditionally, a mojito is a cocktail that consists of five ingredients: white rum, sugar, lime juice, soda water, and mint.
A popular alcoholic highball drink made with orange juice and vodka.
A cocktail of tequila, or gin, and grapefruit juice, served in a highball glass with a salted rim.
A caffeinated alcoholic cocktail made of cola, lime, and dark or light rum.
